sourcesContent:
// src/data/articles.js

const articles = [
  {
    id: 1,
    title: "Union Budget Highlights",
    slug: "union-budget",
    category: "Economy",
    content:
      "The Union Budget outlines the government's financial plan for the year, focusing on infrastructure spending, tax reforms, fiscal deficit targets, and support for startups and MSMEs.",
    createdAt: "2026-02-02T06:30:00.000Z",
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    title: "Supreme Court Recent Judgments",
    slug: "supreme-court-judgments",
    category: "Polity",
    content:
      "Recent Supreme Court judgments have addressed constitutional rights, electoral reforms, digital privacy, and social justice issues.",
    createdAt: "2026-02-01T06:30:00.000Z",
  },
  {
    id: 3,
    title: "India’s GDP Growth Report",
    slug: "gdp-growth-report",
    category: "Economy",
    content:
      "India recorded strong GDP growth driven by manufacturing, services, infrastructure investments, and domestic consumption.",
    createdAt: "2026-01-31T06:30:00.000Z",
  },
  {
    id: 4,
    title: "Artificial Intelligence in India",
    slug: "ai-in-india",
    category: "Technology",
    content:
      "India is expanding AI adoption across healthcare, education, governance, and industry through national AI strategies.",
    createdAt: "2026-01-30T06:30:00.000Z",
  },
  {
    id: 5,
    title: "Climate Change Global Summit",
    slug: "climate-change-summit",
    category: "Environment",
    content:
      "Global leaders discussed climate finance, emission reduction targets, renewable energy adoption, and sustainable development goals.",
    createdAt: "2026-01-29T06:30:00.000Z",
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    title: "ISRO’s Latest Space Mission",
    slug: "isro-space-mission",
    category: "Science",
    content:
      "ISRO launched a new space mission aimed at satellite deployment, planetary research, and strengthening India’s space capabilities.",
    createdAt: "2026-01-28T06:30:00.000Z",
  },
  {
    id: 7,
    title: "India–USA Strategic Partnership",
    slug: "india-usa-partnership",
    category: "International",
    content:
      "The India–USA partnership covers defense cooperation, trade, technology transfer, clean energy, and geopolitical collaboration.",
    createdAt: "2026-01-27T06:30:00.000Z",
  },
];

export default articles;
